title: 83/118/EEC: Commission Decision of 10 March 1983 approving the extended plan for the eradication of bovine tuberculosis presented by Italy (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 10 March 1983
approving the extended plan for the eradication of bovine tuberculosis presented by Italy
(Only the Italian text is authentic)
(83/118/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The extended plan for the eradication of tuberculosis as applied by Italy from 31 December 1982 is hereby approved.
Financial participation by the Community shall be in respect of eligible expenditure on account of slaughterings taking place on or after 31 December 1982.
This Decision is addressed to Italy.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 10 March 1983.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
